queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select mil.BA , mi.AO , left(mpr.matman,1) 'Sec' , count(mpr.pr) NrPREQ , sum(if(mpr.spec_complete='Y',1,0)) 'SpecOK' , sum(if(mprv.status='T',1,0)) 'NrStatusT' , concat('MRN_SPE03#10#',sum(mpr.invest_basis_amount)) 'SumInvBas' , concat('MRN_SPE03#10#',sum(mpr.invest_subst_amount)) 'SumInvSub' , sum(mil.budget) 'SumBudget' , if(sum(mil.com_committed)=0,concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',sum(mil.com_committed)),sum(mil.com_committed)) 'SumCommitted' , case when round(sum(mil.com_committed)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)>90 then concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',round(sum(mil.com_committed)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)) when round(sum(mil.com_committed)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)>95 then concat('MRN_SPE03#F04#',round(sum(mil.com_committed)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)) when mil.com_committed=0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',0) else concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',round(sum(mil.com_committed)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)) end 'RelCommitted' , sum(mil.sum_ordered) 'SumOrdered' , if(round(sum(mil.sum_ordered)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)>=98,concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',round(sum(mil.sum_ordered)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)),round(sum(mil.sum_ordered)/sum(mil.budget)*100,2)) 'RelOrdered' ,sum(if(mil.sum_invoiced>0,mil.sum_invoiced,0)) 'SumInvoiced' ,sum(mil.sum_paid) 'SumPaid' from mrqr_pur_req mpr inner join (select pr ,max(pr_version_id) vs_id from mrqr_pur_req_ver where year<='pYEAR' and not(status in ('U','E')) group by pr)max on mpr.pr=max.pr inner join mrqr_pur_req_ver mprv on mprv.pr_version_id=max.vs_id inner join mrqr_imputation_lines mil on mil.pr=mpr.pr inner join mrqr_imputation mi on mi.imp_id=mil.bim_id
where mpr.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and IF('pMATMAN'='',true,mpr.matman='pMATMAN') and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(mpr.matman,1)='pSECTION') and IF('pDIVISION'='Sys',left(mpr.matman,1) in ('S','R','F','N'),left(mpr.matman,1) in ('C','I')) and mil.year='pYEAR' and left(mil.BA,2)='74' and mi.active='Y' and IF('pPREQ'='',true,mpr.pr='pPREQ') and (mpr.invest_basis_amount>0 or mpr.invest_subst_amount>0) group by BA, AO, Sec

select concat('MRN_SPE05#LI',mpr.pr,'#',mpr.pr) DD , concat('MRN_SPE02#9902&p|PREQ=',mpr.pr,'#',mpr.pr) PR , mil.BA BA , mi.AO , IFNULL(mpr.name_nl, mpr.description) Name , left(mpr.matman,1) 'Sec' , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mpr.matman,'#0#',mpr.matman) 'MM' , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mpr.LS,'#0#',mpr.LS) 'LS' , if(mpr.spec_complete='Y','MRN_SPE03#F04#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N') 'SpecOK' , if(mprv.status='T',concat('MRN_SPE09#03#DSTAT#',mprv.status,'#0#',mprv.status),concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#MRN_SPE09#03#DSTAT#',mprv.status,'#0#',mprv.status)) 'status' , concat('MRN_SPE03#10#', mil.COM_LAUNCHED_INI) 'InvLaunch' , concat('MRN_SPE03#10#',mpr.invest_basis_amount) 'InvBas' , concat('MRN_SPE03#10#',mpr.invest_subst_amount) 'InvSub' , if(mil.budget=0,concat('MRN_SPE03#F13#',mil.budget),mil.budget) Budget , case when mprv.status='T' AND mil.com_committed=0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',mil.com_committed) when round(mil.com_committed/mil.budget,2)*100>98 then concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',mil.com_committed) when mprv.status='T' AND mil.com_committed>0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#03#',mil.com_committed) else mil.com_committed end 'Committed' , case when mprv.status='T' AND mil.sum_ordered=0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',mil.sum_ordered) when round(mil.sum_ordered/mil.budget,2)*100>98 then concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',mil.sum_ordered) when mprv.status='T' AND mil.sum_ordered>0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#03#',mil.sum_ordered) else mil.sum_ordered end 'Ordered' ,mil.sum_invoiced 'Invoiced' ,mil.sum_paid 'Paid' , case when mil.COM_LAUNCHED_INI=0 AND mpr.invest_basis_amount=0 then 'UNK' when mil.COM_COMMITTED=0 then 'UNK' when mil.COM_LAUNCHED_INI=0 then round(abs((mpr.invest_basis_amount - mil.COM_COMMITTED)*100/mil.COM_COMMITTED),2) else round(abs((mil.COM_LAUNCHED_INI - mil.COM_COMMITTED)*100/mil.COM_COMMITTED),2) end 'BudgetDiff' ,concat('MRN_SPE01#PREQ&arg1=',mpr.pr) L -- ,mprv.vs 'Version' from mrqr_pur_req mpr inner join (select pr ,max(pr_version_id) vs_id from mrqr_pur_req_ver where year<='pYEAR' and not(status in ('U','E')) group by pr)max on mpr.pr=max.pr inner join mrqr_pur_req_ver mprv on mprv.pr_version_id=max.vs_id inner join mrqr_imputation_lines mil on mil.pr=mpr.pr inner join mrqr_imputation mi on mi.imp_id=mil.bim_id
where mpr.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and IF('pMATMAN'='',true,mpr.matman='pMATMAN') and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(mpr.matman,1)='pSECTION') and IF('pDIVISION'='Sys',left(mpr.matman,1) in ('S','R','F','N'),left(mpr.matman,1) in ('C','I')) and mil.year='pYEAR' and left(mil.BA,2)='74' and mi.active='Y' and IF('pPREQ'='',true,mpr.pr='pPREQ') and IF('pBUDGETZERO'='on',mil.budget=0,true) and (mpr.invest_basis_amount>0 or mpr.invest_subst_amount>0)
